snippet: Anthony Chiasson and Todd Newman are accused of conspiring with six others to earn roughly $70 million from illegal trading in technology stocks.
abstract: Anthony Chiasson and Todd Newman are accused of conspiring with six others to earn roughly $70 million from illegal trading in technology stocks.

headline.main: Defense Opens Insider Trading Case With Attack on Witnesses
